base_description: Analyzing the topology, we find 6 nodes and 7 branches in this circuit. For passive elements, the circuit contains 4 resistive element(s). The circuit is powered by 1 voltage source(s), 1 current source(s). The circuit also features 1 dependent source(s). Measurement setup includes 1 voltage measurement(s), 1 current measurement(s). In total, this circuit comprises 7 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Update resistive element 1: change its value from 75立 to 500立.
Set the resistive element 4 to 4k立 (previously 40k立).
Set the DC voltage source 1 to 5V (previously 10V).
